task.shortdesc: How SMs can set their partners up with their new 4-digit PIN for clocking in and out of scheduled shifts in TeamWorks.

step.cmd: Open the following link in your browser:
Partners will need to enter their Global User ID and Password
Answer the Q&A to access the system
Locate the Alternate ID section within the screen that appears and click the Registration button
Instruct partners to create their 4-digit PIN (PRO TIP: a partner's 4-digit POS sign-in code could be their 4 digit PIN)
Click Update to save the 4-digit PIN

stepresult.cmd: Partners will receive a confirmation that they have successfully created their PIN
